name: 海保映美璃
birth_place: 美国,夏威夷,瓦胡岛,火奴鲁鲁
introduction: Emily Kaiho was born in Hawaii to a Scottish-American mother and Japanese father.She was raised in Japan and worked as a model and dancer.To advance her career, Emily decided to move to Los Angeles in early 2008. Within a few months she was cast for the role of Momoko in a stylized martial arts film “Bunraku”. Her film debut had happened like a streak of lightening!Emily started training martial arts with the stunt team for this film and she really got into it.Now back in Los Angeles , she continues to train every day in preparation for future film projects.
